definition: lit. the timber has been turned into a boat already (idiom)/fig. what is done cannot be undone
surname Mu
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
already/to stop/then/afterwards
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng
boat

sentences.english: It's too late to change it now. What's done is done.
sentences.chinese: 现在再改变已经来不及了，木已成舟。

sentences.english: But the damage is done now. Saying sorry won’t mend anything.
sentences.chinese: 但木已成舟，说难过也于事无补了。

sentences.english: Mother was very angry but what’s done is done.
sentences.chinese: 虽然母亲非常生气，但是木已成舟。

sentences.english: Think before you answer, for it shall be done as you decide.
sentences.chinese: 先好好想想再回答，因为你一决定，就木已成舟了。

sentences.english: But we are where we are.
What’s done is done, no matter how hard you wish or how much you think about it.
sentences.chinese: 木已成舟，无论你多么渴望，想再多也是没用的。

sentences.english: What's done is done. Further reprimanding him will not fix anything.
sentences.chinese: 事到如今木已成舟，你再训斥他也没有用了。

definition: lit. the rice has already been cooked (idiom)/fig. what is done cannot be undone
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: fait accompli
lit. the raw rice is now cooked (idiom); fig. it is done and can't be changed/It's too late to change anything now./also written 生米煮成熟飯|生米煮成熟饭
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zuo4 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: if you ride a tiger, it's hard to get off (idiom); fig. impossible to stop halfway
spilt water is difficult to retrieve (idiom)/it's no use crying over spilt milk/what's done is done and can't be reversed/the damage is done/once divorced, there's no reuniting
as matters stand/things having reached this stage
lit. to push the boat with the current/fig. to take advantage of the situation for one's own benefit
irrevocable/the die is cast
to refuse to admit (what one has done)/to disavow/to renege
abbr. for 生米煮成熟飯|生米煮成熟饭, lit. the raw rice is now cooked (idiom); fig. it is done and can't be changed/It's too late to change anything now.
(of a plot etc) to fall through and stand exposed
to pass the misfortune on to sb else (idiom); to blame others/to pass the buck
when things come to a head (idiom)
lit. paper can't wrap fire; fig. the truth will out
to play deaf-mute
